help-text.default: As game master, you can pause/resume games and control who joins (and as what nation). To play yourself, you need to join as a player after creating your game.
help-text.disabled: Game master only allowed in private games (risk of abuse)

skip-get-ready-phase-checkbox.label: Skip get ready phase
skip-get-ready-phase-checkbox.help-text: The Get Ready phase asks players to confirm they're ready. If players don't respond, they are removed and the game goes back to try to find replacements before the game can start. This prevents absent people ruining a game.

end-after-years-checkbox.label: End in draw after number of years

anonymous-chat-checkbox.label: Anonymous
anonymous-chat-checkbox.explanation: Anonymous only allowed in private games (risk of abuse)

quickness-enabled-checkbox.label: Quickness
quickness-enabled-checkbox.help-text: Find players that confirm their orders before the deadline

min-rating-input.label: Minimum rating
min-rating-input.help-text: Removes the least challenging {{ percentage }}% of players

error-message.more-than-user-rating: Can't be higher than your own rating ({{ rating }})

max-rating-enabled-checkbox.label: Maximum rating
max-rating-enabled-checkbox.help-text: Find players that aren't too challenging

max-rating-input.label: Maximum rating
max-rating-input.help-text: Removes the most challenging {{ percentage }}% of players

error-message.less-than-user-rating: Can't be lower than your own rating ({{ rating }})

reset-settings-dialog.title: Reset settings
reset-settings-dialog.prompt: Are you sure you want to reset settings? This will restore all settings to the default values.

confirm-orders-button.label: Accept draw
confirm-orders-button.no-orders: You have no orders to give this turn
confirm-orders-button.prompt: When you're ready for the next turn

nation-preferences.title: Nation preferences
nation-preferences.prompt: Sort the possible nations in order of preference.

login.description: A digital version of the classic game of Diplomacy. Sign in to play.

color-non-scs-switch.label: Colour non-SC provinces
color-non-scs-switch.help-text: Colour provinces without supply centers based on the ownership of the supply centers around it.

error-notifications.no-permission-prompt: Allow this sites notifications in your browser settings.
error-notifications.info-link: Allow this sites notifications in your browser settings.
error-notifications.messaging-not-started: Notifications disabled [Error: Notification system did not start]
error-notifications.firebase-not-supported: Notifications disabled [Error: Firebase Messaging not supported on your browser]
